Text.Page: I listen to logger complaints all day while my wife plays with a string of castanic "confidants." It's getting to the point where I'll head back into the forest, faeries or no faeries.

Oh, isn't this <PCNAME>! You've come just in time! You took a big load off my chest! There are still many other things left, but as long as there are many adventurers like you, then the reset will unravel someday. Anyway, I'd like to buy you a drink sometime! Ha ha ha!
